projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern portfolio website featuring animated particles, smooth scrolling, and responsive design. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with product listings, cart functionality, user authentication, and payment processing.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive weather application showing current conditions and forecasts using weather API data with interactive charts.

projects.title: Task Management API
projects.description: RESTful API for task management with user authentication, task creation, updating, and deletion capabilities.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: A chat application supporting real-time messaging, user presence, and file sharing using WebSockets.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: A content management system for blogs with rich text editing, image uploads, and comment functionality.
